title: Beautiful Trauma
summary: Beautiful Trauma  is the seventh studio album by American singer-songwriter Pink. It was released on October 13, 2017, by RCA Records. Following the completion of The Truth About Love and its promotion, Pink took a career hiatus to focus on her personal life and become reinspired. Beautiful Trauma developed over a three-year period. The singer collaborated with a variety of producers, enlisting help from collaborators such as Greg Kurstin, Max Martin, Jack Antonoff, and Shellback. Pink and her manager, Roger Davies, served as the album's executive producers. Primarily a pop record, it also incorporates influences from EDM and folk music. The lyrical content reflects primarily on themes of love, heartbreak, and the duality of life, as well as expressing societal and global issues.
